author: IGN
description:
Join Maggie Robertson (voice of Alcina Dimitrescu in Resident Evil Village) for a look back at the iconic horror game series ahead of Resident Evil: Requiem's launch on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store) on February 27, 2026. The latest Resident Evil: Requiem trailer gives a deep dive into the origin of the series from Resident Evil 1 through Resident Evil: Village, its story revolving around the t-Virus and the 1998 Raccoon City Incident, Umbrella Corporation, and its characters, including Claire Redfield, Leon Kennedy, and more.

The trailer also unveils Resident Evil 7 Biohazard: Gold Edition and Resident Evil: Village Gold Edition are coming to Nintendo Switch 2 on February 27, 2026, with extra game modes and post-story scenarios. Resident Evil: Village will also feature a third-person gameplay option. We also get another look at Resident Evil: Requiem, including details of the standard edition and deluxe edition of the hor
title: Resident Evil Requiem - Official 'Road to Requiem' Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Go Home Annie: An SCP Game trailer for this twisted psychological thriller and an original story set in the SCP universe. As an employee of the SCP Foundation, test artificially created paranormal events, solve puzzles, interact with anomalies, and uncover the secrets of the Replication Division. Go Home Annie: An SCP Game is available now on PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GOG), with a free PC update coming. Go Home Annie: An SCP Game is also coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S in 2026.

The trailer reveals a new update for Go Home Annie: An SCP Game is coming, featuring a new section of the game with unique gameplay mechanics. In the update, a gruesome new threat is now stalking the dark hallways of the Facility, forcing Annie to stay one step ahead at all times. To survive, she’ll need to run, hide, and master the supernatural handheld camera in creative new ways to overcome her biggest and scariest challenge yet.

#IGN #gaming
title: Go Home Annie: An SCP Game - Official PC Update and Console Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Windswept, a 2D action-adventure platformer developed by WeatherFell. Aid Marbles and Checkers on a grand adventure to return home after a hectic storm displaces the duo. Overcome obstacles, dispatch enemies, and make it home in one piece. Windswept is launching on November 11 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Windswept - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out high level gameplay from Vampire Survivors: Ante Chamber DLC, aka the Balatro collab. This addition to the game introduces a new card system, new characters, a remix of the Balatro theme, and a ton more. We defeated the reapers at the end. 

Gameplay captured on a PC.

#IGN #gaming
title: Pushing Vampire Survivors to Its Limit | Ante Chamber Balatro DLC Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Fellowship is a game that asks the question: "What if WoW was just about the dungeon crawling?" It pares down the quintessential Massively Multiplayer Online RPG experience and focuses entirely on what many believe to be the most fun element: The teamwork oriented dungeons and boss fights. In this video we go over what Fellowship is all about, break down the three game modes, and cover some quick tips as well.

#IGN #gaming
title: What Is Fellowship? - WoW… But Only Dungeons!

author: IGN
description:
Desktop Explorer now has a demo ahead of its Q2 2026 release on PC. In this game, you’ll need to search through abandoned profiles on an old PC to solve an inherited mystery. What secrets can you uncover in cryptic games and outdated software? Who was using this computer? Are they still alive? Learn the answers to these and more when Desktop Explorer arrives next year.

#IGN #gaming
title: Desktop Explorer - Official Demo Release Trailer| Indie Horror Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Pals are coming to the world of Nalcott. Watch the Once Human x Palworld launch trailer to see what to expect with this collaboration coming to the multiplayer open-world survival game. During the Once Human x Palworld collaboration event, transform into a Pal, hop on the "bus" and explore the island, and more! Once Human is available on PC (Windows, Steam and Epic Games Store), the App Store, and Google Play, and it is coming to PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X/S. The Once Human x Palworld collaboration event begins October 30, 2025.

#OnceHuman #Palworld #Gaming
title: Once Human x Palworld - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Playtest Trailer for Haunted Paws, a co-op horror game developed by LazyFlock. Players will embody two puppies on a mission to save their human friend from a haunted mansion. Dispatch enemies, sneak around the mansion, and take naps whenever necessary. Haunted Paws is coming soon to PC (Steam) with a playtest on Steam running from October 31 through November 7.
title: Haunted Paws - Official Playtest Trailer

As The Replacers step in for expecting parents at their gender reveal party, the one true Replacer returns from his voyage into the depths of space. Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 is launching on November 14 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Epic Conclusion' Featurette for Wicked: For Good, the sequel to the hit musical film distributed by Universal Pictures. Don't miss the latest featurette covering the different dynamics of Elphaba and Glinda as they settle into their historically iconic roles alongside the new film, acting as the bridge between the story of Wicked and The Wizard of Oz. Wicked: For Good is in theaters on November 21.

Directed once again by award-winning director Jon M. Chu and starring the spectacular returning cast, led by Academy Award® nominated superstars Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, the final chapter of the untold story of the witches of Oz begins with Elphaba and Glinda estranged and living with the consequences of their choices. 

Elphaba (Cynthia Erivo), now demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, lives in exile, hidden within the Ozian forest while continuing her fight for the freedom of Oz’s silenced Animals and desperately trying to expose the truth she knows about The
title: Wicked: For Good - Official 'Epic Conclusion' Featurette (2025) Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande

description:
Play as a space merchant selling and trading your wares across the galaxy in Stellar Trader, a new 4X space-trading sci-fi sim in development for PC. You'll build space stations, negotiate prices, avoid pirates, work the black market, tilt the scales in wars with your economic prowess, and so much more. Wishlist Stellar Trader on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3867570/Stellar_Trader/

#IGN #Gaming

Marvel Cosmic Invasion is launching on December 1 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

author: IGN
description:
Get a look at the Complete Edition Overview Trailer for Atomfall, a first-person open-world action adventure survival game developed by Rebellion. 

Players will explore a secluded region of Britain that's been left in disarray after a disaster. Venture into the quarantine zone to scavenge, craft, and fight to uncover the truth behind the inciting incident. The latest overview gives players all of the details behind the game's Complete Edition, packed with the main game, both story expansions, and the two supply bundles. 

Atomfall Complete Edition is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam and Epic Games Store).

#IGN #Atomfall #FPS
title: Atomfall - Official Complete Edition Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake reviewed by George Yang on Nintendo Switch 2, also available on PC, PS5, Switch 1, Xbox Series X|S. 

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake beautifully concludes Square Enix’s remake trilogy. By using the iconic HD-2D style, it’s able to recapture the retro magic of the originals while giving them a modern facelift. Both games adhere to old-school turn-based combat that holds up despite being fairly simple, with the first offering a tightly focused solo adventure and the second being more expansive with its party-based structure – not to mention its stronger emphasis on storytelling and character development. By including helpful quality-of-life features, Dragon Quest I & II feel approachable without losing that warm and fuzzy nostalgic feeling. And while it doesn’t resolve some uneven difficulty woes, when taken alongside last year’s Dragon Quest III HD-2D Remake, this collection stands as a heartfelt tribute to the origins of Dragon Quest’s enduring RPG l
title: Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake Review

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Reveal Trailer for NBA The Run, a 3v3 street arcade basketball game developed by Play by Play Studios in collaboration with the NBA. Players will take to the streets with the biggest NBA Stars in the league to face off against the best of the best in Knockout Tournaments on legendary streetball courts. NBA The Run is fitted with a rollback netcode system for smooth online play and a suite of different tricks to master. NBA The Run is launching in 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).
title: NBA The Run - Official Reveal Trailer

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X and S, Windows PC, and Steam on October 30, 2025.

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake is reimagined with new content and enhancements, including an expanded story, new enemies, new dungeons, the addition of mini-medals, and more. This gameplay features Dragon Quest II's opening cutscene through the first dungeon.

Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D will be available on Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X and S, Windows PC, and Steam on October 30, 2025.

author: IGN
description:
Be brave. Check out this tense clip from Predator: Badlands, an upcoming sci-fi action-adventure film starring Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi and Elle Fanning. 

Set in the future on a deadly remote planet, Predator: Badlands follows a young Predator outcast (played by newcomer Dimitrius Schuster-Koloamatangi) who finds an unlikely ally in Thia (Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Elle Fanning) as he embarks on a treacherous journey in search of the ultimate adversary. 

Produced by John Davis, Dan Trachtenberg, Marc Toberoff, Ben Rosenblatt and Brent O’Connor, Predator: Badlands opens exclusively in movie theaters on November 7 in IMAX, Dolby Cinema, RealD (3D), Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX and premium screens everywhere.

#IGN #PredatorBadlands #ActionAdventure
title: Predator: Badlands - Official 'Be Brave Brother' Clip

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Official Trailer for The Beldham, a horror suspense film distributed by Quiver Distribution. Explore the lengths a mother will go to protect her own in The Beldham, releasing on Digital and On Demand on November 7.

A new mother returns to her childhood home, only to face a malevolent, age-old entity lurking in the walls. As the haunting escalates, she’s pushed to the brink to protect her baby—and her mind. 

The Beldham stars Patricia Heaton, Katie Parker, Emma Fitzpatrick, and Corbin Bernsen. The film is written and directed by Angela Gulner, alongside being produced by Talia Bella, Angela Gulner, Mark Meir, and Randy Wayne.

The Beldham is releasing on Digital and On Demand on November 7.

#IGN #Beldham #Horror
title: The Beldham - Official Trailer (2025) Patricia Heaton, Katie Parker, Emma Fitzpatrick

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'All Shorts Now Streaming' Teaser Trailer for Star Wars: Visions Volume 3, a sci-fi anthology anime series set in the Star Wars universe distributed by Disney+. Star Wars: Visions Volume 3 is streaming now only on Disney+.

The award-winning anthology of animated short films celebrates the mythology of Star Wars through unique cultural lenses. Star Wars: Visions Volume 3 features nine shorts from nine different anime studios—david production, Kamikaze Douga + ANIMA, Kinema citrus Co., Polygon Pictures, Production I.G, Project Studio Q, TRIGGER, WIT STUDIO—to further demonstrate the diversity and creativity of Japanese animation.

Star Wars: Visions Volume 3 is streaming now only on Disney+.

#IGN #StarWarsVisions #Disney+
title: Star Wars: Visions Volume 3 - Official 'All Shorts Now Streaming' Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Accolades Trailer for Ninja Gaiden 4, the latest installment in the action hack-and-slash adventure game developed by Platinum Games and Team Ninja. 

Players will embark on an action-packed journey in near-future Tokyo, facing off against enemy after enemy as a new character named Yakumo, fighting back against the returning Dark Dragon. Take a look at the latest trailer to garner the critical reception behind Ninja Gaiden 4, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox Game Pass, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #NinjaGaiden4 #HackAndSlash
title: Ninja Gaiden 4 - Official Accolades Trailer

author: IGN
description: Between this summer’s animated anthology, Predator: Killer of Killers, and the upcoming Predator: Badlands, 2025 is shaping up to be the year of the Yautja. So, what better excuse to recap the events of this iconic action sci-fi franchise? From the classic 1987 original Predator, it’s 1990 inner-city sequel Predator 2, the more recent installments like Predators and The Predator, not to mention the xenomorph-infested questionably canon crossovers, Alien Vs. Predator and AVP Requiem, the scattered timeline of this series is almost as confusing as its naming convention. With Prey’s first foray into Predator period-pieces, and the crash course in Predator: Killer of Killers, these alien hunters have been showing up on earth for quite some time now, and based on the trailers, Predator Badlands will take place further into the future than we’ve seen yet, steering as clear of the convoluted canon of the Alien movies and Alien Earth, while still incorporating the shadowy dealings of Weyland-
title: The Predator Movie Timeline in Chronological Order

author: IGN
description:
17 Minutes of Battlefield 6's RedSec Battle Royale game mode at max settings, 4K, and 60 FPS.
Played on RTX 5090 GPU and AMD 9800X3D CPU.

Players will duke it out across in high-octane action against 100-player lobbies to become the last team or player standing to reign victorious before the fire ring closes in. Make use of an array of weapons, equipment, and more to progress through REDSEC Challenges and the Battle Pass to earn rewards. 

Battlefield REDSEC is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.

#IGN #Battlefield #REDSEC
title: Battlefield 6: RedSec Battle Royale - 17 Minutes of Gameplay (Max Settings 4K 60FPS)

author: IGN
description:
The Outer Worlds 2 wastes no time and throws you right into the game, and while it does a good job of giving you tooltips and tutorials for most things, there are a few questions that it leaves unanswered, or instructions that might be easy to miss. We’ve traipsed across Arcadia and come all the way back to Earth to tell you these 14 Things We Wish We Knew that The Outer Worlds 2 Doesn’t Tell You.

For more help with The Outer Worlds 2, check out our wiki!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/the-outer-worlds-2

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:24 - 1: You Can Respec Once
00:57 - 2: Spend Skill Points Wisely
01:21 - 3: How to Activate Hourglass Prompts
01:43 - 4: Healing With Food
02:01 - 5: Auto-Docs Restore Inhaler Charges
02:25 - 6: Hoard Trauma Kits
02:57 - 7: Infinite Carry Capacity
03:24 - 8: Crimes With No Punishment
03:50 - 9: How to Activate Your Torch
04:05 - 10: How to Change The Camera (First to Third Person)
04:26 - 11: Activate Adaptive Triggers on PS5
04:42 - 12: Companion Perks vs. U
title: The Outer Worlds 2 - 14 Things It Doesn't Tell You
